readme_content:
[![César Álvarez](https://github.com/cesaralvrz/cesaralvrz/blob/master/img/banner2.png)](https://cesaralvarez.dev/)

# Hey, I'm César!

[![Linkedin Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/-C%C3%A9sar%20Álvarez%20Llaneza-blue?style=social&logo=Linkedin&logoColor=blue&link=https://www.linkedin.com/in/cesaralvarezllaneza/)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/cesaralvarezllaneza/)
[![Gmail Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/-cesaralvrzll-c14438?style=social&logo=Gmail&logoColor=red&link=mailto:cesaralvrzll@gmail.com)](mailto:cesaralvrzll@gmail.com)
[![GitHub followers](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/cesaralvrz?label=Follow&style=social)](https://github.com/cesaralvrz) 

<!--
 Thank you for visiting my README.md file here check this video out: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ZGbIKd0XrM 
-->

* I am a Frontend Developer from [Asturias, Spain](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g4dUHEkAL4M&ab_channel=TurismoAsturias) 🇪🇸
* Visit my [personal website](https://cesaralvarez.dev/) 
* Techstack: `.js`, `.vue`, `.jsx`, `.html`, `.css`, `.py` 
* Founder of [Acadeller](https://github.com/Acadeller) 💡

### Github Stats:

![Stats Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cesaralvrz/github-stats-transparent/output/generated/overview.svg)
![Most Used Languages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cesaralvrz/github-stats-transparent/output/generated/languages.svg)

![](https://visitor-badge.glitch.me/badge?page_id=cesaralvrz.cesaralvrz)
[![Open Source Love](https://badges.frapsoft.com/os/v1/open-source.svg?v=102)](https://github.com/ellerbrock/open-source-badge/)

cesaralvrz/WildTopDogs.summary: Significant updates occurred on February 10 and 18, including the addition of styles, correct link, horizontal scroll for mobile, and update photos. Additionally, a 'Move button after video' improvement was made on February 18.

acadeller/core.summary: A push event occurred on February 25, after which a new blog entry was added and 'merge' changes were implemented.

cesaralvrz/register.summary: Only a single push event was observed on February 12, where 'Create tu-dominio.json' was initiated.

profile_summary:
Here is a concise, SEO-optimized first-person profile description based on the provided details:

As a seasoned software engineer with a strong focus on backend development, I bring expertise in languages such as TypeScript, Python, and R to drive innovative solutions. With a background in building scalable systems, I am also passionate about making software accessible through services and education, as evident in my work as the founder of Acadeller.
